Level Three
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Card & Adventure Video Games: Monster Rancher Explorer Archive (Game Boy Color): Strategy: Level Three
By Y.K.TAN on Saturday, July 14, 2001 - 05:20 am:

Stage 3

Create a box,on your right,when you start the level,AND MIND YOU IN CASE THE GHOST ATTACKS. After jumping on top of the box,create another box on the opposite side of your box which you are standing,and keep repeating this,until you get to the middle part of the stage. Move right,and destroy the box on the right of the middle part,and you will go to the right part of the stage. Do the same thing as part one,and go up to get the golden key. If you cannot reach the key,on the top part,stand on the box,which is facing the outer wall,and stand on it,and quickly make a box underneath/right to you,and make it fast,and stand on that box,because the ghost is coming. And take the key. After that,get to the first part of the stage(I WOULDN'T NEED TO EXPLAIN THIS PART,IT'S AS SIMPLE AS A,B,C.). Than do the same method, and go to the door,and YOU WIN STAGE 3.
